metadata.title: CVE-2016-10130 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The http_connect function in transports/http.c in libgit2 before 0.24.6 and0.25.x before 0.25.1 might allow man-in-the-middle attackers to spoofservers by leveraging clobbering of the error variable.

criterions.comment: libgit2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
